Class RoadSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoadSegment

  • public class RoadSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a simple slice of road, a kerb and offroad grass for the game Racer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String KERB_COLOUR 
      static double KERB_WIDTH 
      static java.lang.String ROUGH_COLOUR

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoadSegment

        public RoadSegment(double x,
                   double y,
                   double width,
                   double height,
                   GameArena a)
        Creates a new RoadSegment, at the given location and size.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position on the screen of the road segment.
        y - The y position on the screen of the road segment.
        width - The width of this road segment (in pixels)
        height - The height of this road segment (in pixels)
        a - The GameArena upon which to draw this road segment.

    • Method Detail

      • setXPosition

        public void setXPosition(double x)
        Changes the position of this RoadSegment to the given location
        Parameters:
        x - The new x positition of this RoadSegment on the screen.

      • setYPosition

        public void setYPosition(double y)
        Changes the position of this RoadSegment to the given location
        Parameters:
        y - The new y positition of this RoadSegment on the screen.

      • getXPosition

        public double getXPosition()
        Determines the position of this RoadSegment on the screen
        Returns:
        The x position of the centre of this RoadSegment on the screen.

      • getYPosition

        public double getYPosition()
        Determines the position of this RoadSegment on the screen
        Returns:
        The y position of the centre of this RoadSegment on the screen.

      • getParts

        public Rectangle[] getParts()
        Provides a list (array) containing all the GameArena Rectangle objects that make up this road segment.
        Returns:
        The list of Rectangles that makes up this RoadSegment

      • setXSpeed

        public void setXSpeed(double s)
        Sets the speed of this RoadSegment in the X axis - i.e. the number of pixels it moves in the X axis every time move() is called.
        Parameters:
        s - The new speed of this RoadSegment in the x axis

      • setYSpeed

        public void setYSpeed(double s)
        Sets the speed of this RoadSegment in the Y axis - i.e. the number of pixels it moves in the Y axis every time move() is called.
        Parameters:
        s - The new speed of this RoadSegment in the y axis

      • move

        public void move()
        Updates the position of this RoadSegment by a small amount, depending upon its speed. see setXSpeed(0 and setYSpeed() methods.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Delete all the Rectangles that make up this RoadSegment from the screen

      • addObstacle

        public void addObstacle(int type)
        Adds an obstacle to the road slice.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the obstacle (there are 4 types of obstacles .-. , -.- , --. , ..-)
